snippet.title: Announcing Galactic Ruler Enlightenment
snippet.description:
Announcing new adventures in the Galactic Ruler universe - Galactic Ruler Enlightenment!

We talk about what's new in this next Galactic Ruler game.

Add Galactic Ruler Enlightenment to your Steam Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2338470/Galactic_Ruler_Enlightenment/

Check out the Demo in the upcoming Steam Next-Fest starting February 5th 2024:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2338470/Galactic_Ruler_Enlightenment/

Play the original Galactic Ruler: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138440/Galactic_Ruler/
Check out our other games: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/battlegoat
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2093410/Supreme_Ruler_2030/

Connect with BattleGoat Studios:

▶ Discord: https://goo.gl/2DV5Pj 
▶ Twitter: https://goo.gl/2mxFZM 
▶ Facebook: https://goo.gl/jxPHwj 
▶ Website: https://goo.gl/WNwZOb 
▶ Forums: https://www.bgforums.com

Music used in video with license from https://EpidemicSound.com
